artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Koshimuraya Heisuke; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
markings: Censor seals: 米良 {Mera}, 渡辺 {Watanabe}, 丑七 {Ushi nana} (Ox 7); Carver's seal: 彫竹 {Hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Famous Places in the Sixty-odd Provinces (Rokujūyoshū meisho zue 六十余州名所図絵)
text: No. 12 (Tōkaidō group) on the content page for the series.
title: Suruga Province: Miho Pine Grove
